page.title: 17LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN LEVEN
page.content: I conducted a survey,I asked eight Mums what they thought about living in Leven in 1985.I was interested in finding out about leisure time activities.What people did in their spare time.The village has many activities for children, adults and teenagers; including Playgroup,Mother & Toddler group, Beavers, Cubs, Venture Scouts, Scouts, Guides & Brownies. There are tennis courts,bowling greens, snooker, darts & a cricket & football pitch. There are many special activities for grownups.My survey showed that the people thought that there were enough activities for children, adults & pensioners but they would like more things for teenagers to do.
